summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and ending balances, highlighting various preauthorized debits and credits during the month.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $538,926.61 on March 1, 2017.
The ending balance as of March 31, 2017, was $471,692.03.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made throughout March, including payments to ADP and Oxford Health.
No NSF return item fees were recorded for this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding transactions.
